messages.message: I'm really frustrated with the service I've received regarding my KitKat order!
I apologize for any inconvenience, Alex. Can you please tell me what the issue is?
I ordered a box of KitKats, and it was supposed to arrive last week! Where is it?
Let me look into that for you. It should have been delivered by now.
This is unacceptable! I rely on these for my business, and now I'm completely out!
I understand your frustration and I'm here to resolve this. Can you provide me with your order number?
It's 12345! But honestly, I'm not sure why I even have to repeat myself!
Thank you for that information. I see that there was a delay in shipping. I will escalate this issue and ensure your KitKats are sent out immediately.
You better! This should have been handled sooner! I need my KitKats!
I completely understand. I’ll personally follow up on this and keep you updated. Again, I’m really sorry for the delay.
